diff_hunk:
@@ -752,6 +757,9 @@ def parse_kwargs(desc):
         Non-empty tensors provided must have the same shape, except in the
         cat dimension.
     dim (int, optional): the dimension over which the tensors are concatenated
+        pad_value (float, optional): The value is used in paddings to expand
body:
As mentioned above, `scalar` instead of `float` seems good.

A couple of nits: "padding" instead of "paddings"
"explanation" instead of "introduction"

Otherwise, this looks good!
